body: Dwarves have long been in conflict with elves, especially the hated drow. Dwarves with this racial trait receive a +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the elf subtype. This racial trait replaces the hatred racial trait.
name: Ancient Enmity
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Races/Dwarves/Alternate Racial Traits/Ancient Enmity
